task.title: determining the correct wage range in a labor condition application
task.shortdesc: the wage range acts as a way to tell what is the correct wage a foreign, non-immigrant worker should be paid based on the area and expertise bracket they are in

taskbody.prereq: you must have access to the department of labor's wage website (flag.dol.gov) and the USCIS website
taskbody.context: the correct wage range will enable the creation of the larger labor condition application for a foriegn company

step.cmd: navigate to the homepage of the flag.dol.gov website
navigate to oflc wage search within the wage data tab
fill out fields within this page with the job descritption information you have for the company sponsoring the foreign worker
step.info: if you do not know the o*net occupation code for the given job description, you can use the o*net occupation code search bar located on the same page to find it
step.stepxmp: implementing the parameters, data science will result in the query result of multiple careers dealing with data science with more specific job descriptions and their corresponding o*net code

taskbody.result: once you have filled out the required fields, a range of wage should appear corresponding to the data you inputed
